response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only represents a significant investment in innovation but also holds immense potential to transform various aspects of its user's life or business. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it is worth more than a million dollars to us. Considering the value it brings, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with unparalleled benefits while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
